locale.description: Override automatic locale detection with a specific locale code.

nsfw_pfp_message.default: Your profile picture was detected as containing explicit content
choices: Your profile picture was detected as containing explicit content
Your profile picture is not appropriate for this server.
Your profile picture has been flagged as NSFW.

default: 1. Be respectful â€” no harassment or hate speech.
rules.description: The server rules used for autonomous moderation.

default: 1. No harassment, hate speech, or threats.
3. No incitement to violence or illegal activity.
4. No sexual content or explicit remarks.

aimod-debug.description: Always send a detailed AI moderation debug message to the AI violations channel, including flagged messages, AI decision, and applied actions.

nsfw-verbose.description: Post a detailed scan report embed in the same channel as the scanned media.

nsfw-channel.description: Channel where NSFW violations are logged with a preview of the media.

nsfw-channel-notify.description: Send a notification embed to the channel when NSFW content is removed.

nsfw-enabled.description: Enable NSFW scanning for messages, reactions, and avatars (other toggles still apply).

monitor-events.description: Enable/disable logging for each type of monitored event.

nsfw-detection-action.description: Action to take when a user posts NSFW content.

nsfw-high-accuracy.description: Enable high-accuracy NSFW scans for more reliable detection. Accelerated only.

threshold.description: Threshold for NSFW detection confidence. Lower values are more sensitive.

banned-words-action.description: Action to take when a user posts a banned word.

monitor-channel.description: Channel to log all server activities, including message edits, deletions, and user join/leave events.

captcha-log-channel.description: Channel where captcha verification logs and activity updates are posted.

aimod-channel.description: Channel where AI violation logs are posted.

cycle-strike-actions.description: Cycle through strike actions when you run out of actions to give a user.

exclude-bannedwords-channels.description: Channels to exclude from banned words detection.

strike-actions.description: Actions to take for each strike level.

strike-expiry.description: How long a strike lasts. Use formats like 20s, 30m, 2h, 30d, 2w, 5mo, 1y. Seconds, minutes, hours, days, weeks, months and years respectively.

dm-on-strike.description: DM the user when they receive a strike.

check-pfp.description: Check the user's profile picture for NSFW content.

nsfw-pfp-action.description: Action to take when a user sets an NSFW profile picture.

nsfw-pfp-message.description: The message to send when a player has had their profile picture flagged.
nsfw-pfp-message.default: Your profile picture was found to contain explicit content
choices: Your profile picture was found to contain explicit content
Your profile picture is not appropriate for this server.
Your profile picture has been flagged as NSFW.

unmute-on-safe-pfp.description: Remove the timeout for a user once they have changed their profile picture to something appropriate.

scan-age-restricted.description: Scan age-restricted (NSFW) channels. When off, NSFW channels are skipped.

check-tenor-gifs.description: Apply penalties when NSFW content is detected in Tenor GIFs.

use-default-banned-words.description: Use the built-in profanity list for this server.

delete-scam-messages.description: Automatically delete messages that match scam patterns or URLs.

scam-detection-action.description: Action to take when a scam message is detected.

check-links.description: Check links in messages for malware, phishing, scams etc.

exclude-scam-channels.description: Channels to exclude from scam detection.

aimod-detection-action.description: Action to take when the autonomous moderator detects a violation. Use auto for the AI to make the decision.

aimod-high-accuracy.description: Use higher-accuracy AI moderation with gpt-5-mini (approx. 2.25 USD per 1M tokens). Consumes the monthly budget faster compared to the default.

autonomous-mod.description: Use AI to automatically moderate your entire server.
